alert.note: Alert for Caddo (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 5:13PM CDT until June 17 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Caddo Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southeastern Harrison County in northeastern Texas... Northeastern Panola County in northeastern Texas... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 513 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Elysian Fields, or 12 miles southeast of Marshall, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Shreveport, Marshall, Greenwood, Blanchard, Waskom, Mooringsport, Elysian Fields, Scottsville, Caddo Lake, Cross Lake, Leigh, Jonesville and Bethany. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
